desc: BrickShifter, the quickest and most efficient way to carry engineering & 3 core hole standard facing bricks. Save time and reduce the potential for accidents on-site using the innovatively designed BrickShifter. The patented design is the only one of its kind on the market today!

layout.text: Brickshifter, the quickest and most efficient way to carry engineering & 3 core hole standard facing bricks.
